name: David Poff
text: Received a 50% off coupon stuck to my door and decided to take a chance.  We're 8 minutes from the store, ordered at 7pm on a Wednesday, and didn't get it til 8:20pm. Called after an hour and was told the driver had already left; received …More

name: Ray Carrasquillo
text: Johnny is awesome. Faster than Jimmy Johns (freaky fast). Pizza is great too! #sayrealcheese

name: Random Stuff
text: Terrible experience. I took a chance on Topper’s having heard great things from some friends. My first order was for wings and a BBQ chicken pizza. The wings were terrible, and they forgot to put any sauce on the pizza! When I called back, …More

name: Katherine King
text: This place is our family’s favorite go-to pizza delivery! The pizza is SO delicious! The service has always been outstanding. The delivery is always super fast and the price is very economical! We love the sauce so much that we add extra! …More

name: Rashad Smith
text: Excellent food. One of the few pizza restaurants that completely separate themselves from the competition with their menu alone. They just updated their menu to include macaroni and cheese plates and although small they are delicious. Their …More

name: Eric Sprague
text: I am incredibly picky about my pizza. If the the crust isn't good, I don't even want to bother eating it. It's so frustrating to me when I pay money for a pizza and it just sucks. Toppers doesn't suck. It is the best pizza I've had in Raleigh so far. The crust was flavorful and not cardboard-like. Definitely recommend.

name: Gwinn Johnson
text: The pizzas are good, one of the best places I've had as far as food. Unique pizzas and other items on the menu. There's one staff member there that is great. I think he's a dilvery driver and manager sometimes. However, the owner is not a great person. He's rude and a liar and seems really low class and shady.  I don't trust him.

name: John Burrus
text: The food is very good. I liked both the pizza and the topperstix. I ordered delivery and the food was delivered in one hour, but it was hot. I asked the driver the reason it took one hour. He explained they have been busy and they are …More

name: Fahz Diaz
text: When they first opened i knew they had high expectations especially with many other pizza establishments that is nearby. I work fairly close by them and when i usually get out late in the evening my first choice is Toppers. They stay open …More

name: Wolf of Myth
text: Great pizza and lots of different choices that other people don't have. We've had delivery twice and the delivery staff has been quick and very friendly. Great inside staff too. :) This is our new pizza go to.

name: Nick Morrisson
text: I’ve gone here several times, and the pizza is always delicious and the management team is absolutely incredible. Also, they make fresh, handmade pizza faster than anywhere I’ve been. This is the only pizza joint I’ll take family and friends when they’re in town.

name: Angela You
text: This place opened fairly recently. It's a small place with only a few seats inside. The pizza was good. They make the dough fresh everyday apparently. I liked their wings as well. Last time I went I had to wait a bit for the bread sticks to …More

name: Mart Bradley
text: We love toppers! Everyone is so nice, they’re fast and the pizzas great! Would highly recommend

name: Catherin Lee
text: Nice location and service.  Awesome pizza. Love their topperstix. They open late until 3 AM on Friday and Saturday..

name: Jonathan Wills
text: The pizza is good. A half grade point better than Pizza hutt. Service is fast. The restaurant is take out, but has one table. Seems very clean inside.

name: Lee B Lee
text: Toppers pizza is absolutely the worse. The costumer service is worse than anything. I work at the prison and wanted some for lunch. So I call I carryout because they don't deliver. I order my pizza with extra Italian sausage and cheese. …More

name: 281 Cubicinch
text: Placed an order at 9:13. Delivery time was to be 9:53. 10:15 no pizza. I call store. Manager says driver can't find me. Said driver called him 3 times. Manager asks me to go outside and find the driver. No luck. Called back. Manager says …More

name: Jon Minardo
text: Heard very good things about Toppers and wanted to try it for a while. Loved the quesadilla. Excellent service and quick too.

name: Ron Heidel
text: Lot of unique options for toppings and sauces. Very tasty food. Love the dipping sauces.

name: Michelle Dinato
text: This place is great. So glad they opened in our area. Great pizza, clean friendly atmosphere.

name: Stephanie Santiago
text: Love the pizza! Wish the staff were friendly, it would really be a plus to business. No one wants to order food from someone who sounds monotone, like they hate their life.

name: Joseph Wilcox Jackson
text: This is one of my favorite pizza places! The pizza was fully of flavor, I got the buffalo chicken pizza, it was amazing. The offer a wide selection of pizzas and go well beyond  just pepperoni and cheese. This is a must try.

name: Crystal Singletary
text: I ordered from this location a couple of weeks ago and had a great experience. My Topperstix and macaroni were great. My order arrived on time and my food was still hot. The delivery driver was very friendly. My only complaint is that the …More

name: Steve Minahan
text: Well this was our first time here. Very clean place, friendly staff, pizza and cheese sticks for carry out, my wife and I enjoy our meal very much can not wait to go back. All I can say is YUMMY!!!

name: Tiffany Reed
text: Ordered this when we received a coupon earlier this week. Really good tasting pizza and much better than the big chain pizzas for the same price. Will be ordering more from here.

name: David Jenkins
text: You want options? Toppers has em all. Crazy  macaroni buffalo chicken, chocolate bread sticks, Food was delicious and cheap! I was surprised that no one was in there, food was fast, props to the  courteous staff!

name: Amanda Wilcox
text: Amazing pizza and recipes but whoever owns this specific location needs to take a serious look at who they’ve hired. We waited 15 minutes for food that was supposed to be ready for pickup 5 min before we arrived. Turns out the food was …More

name: Preston Beauchamp
text: Found a toppers flyer on my door for the location nearest my house, there was a menu and a 50% off coupon only good for the week of April 23-may 2nd.  So we called and they told us they don’t deliver to us yet.  We even spoke with the …More

name: Rob Kline
text: Awesome pizza!! Stopped by on their opening day. They have many unique toppings and sauces. I had the Loaded Tot-zza. Never had a pizza with tater tots as a topping. Was skeptical to try it, but I am glad I did. It was just awesome. Will be back to try the other unique pizzas and topperstix.

name: Sue Chen
text: Loved the pizza. Fast delivery service too. Will order again

name: Cesar Fonseca
text: They decided to close 2 hours early today, Sunday September 10th. No notice posted on the door during the week, or today. …More

name: Bob Ucciferri
text: Love the pizza. Had it a few times now and loved it every single time

name: Joel Kerr
text: Worst service I’ve ever received. Called to place an order and told me just to order online. I have a discount which only works for phone orders and the person taking the order didn’t care. We tried this three times and got the same answer. …More

name: Greg Bryan
text: The food is DELICIOUS.  Amazing pizza and excellent service. Lot of options for toppings. I ordered RAGIN pepperoni pizza and topperstix.  Food was very good. Look forward to order again..

name: Andy Whalen
text: Sorry, I know it's a new franchise location and this isn't specific to the location, but the pizza is just awful. We tried four different kinds of pizza on two occasions. The marinara sauce is flavorless, or just spread too thin. The dough …More

name: N G
text: It’s a No from me. Definitely would pick Little Caesar’s over this. Ordered a cheese pizza, it was more than well done. Ordered breadsticks that were supposedly really good but they were dry and over cooked as well. The wings were pretty …More

name: Randall Pendergraft
text: They cut their online ordering off and it tells you to call them..been calling them for the last 20 minutes and no one picks up..y’all say y’all are open till 3 but yet you won’t accept orders. Thanks y’all my car is broke down and I just want to eat some food...people could ruin a wet dream

name: kevin savage
text: Pizza was great first good pizza have found in Raleigh the customer service was very friendly and courteous. My server was Katherine Eaton she was great strongly recommend Toppers

name: Jaquetta Jones
text: I ordered cheese sticks and was told that dipping sauce was only given upon request supposedly. When I called them back to let them know that the cheese sticks were dry, the girl that answered the phone was rude and said (I'm just doing my …More

name: Tom Hosey
text: Pizza is pretty good, and delivery is quick. Haven't had any issues at all, and I've ordered a bunch.

name: Mary Duffy
text: My husband and I have ordered from this Toppers a few times. It's generally ok - the mac & cheese is really good, the pizza is tasty (though light on the sauce), and they offer unique, enjoyable choices. Every time, though, there's …More

name: Marianne Hunt
text: Excellent pizza with lot of topping options. Tried Ragin Pepperoni and Nachostix.  Both are awesome.

name: Kentoria Wright
text: I eat Toppers at least once a week and I'm a chef 😂 I just can't get enough. They're one of the few pizzerias that still have old world pepperoni....so that's an added bonus. Oh, and the bbq wings and chocolate bacon stix are litty 😋🤤. …More

name: Armando Diaz
text: Delicious Pizza. Fast Delivery and very good service.

name: Emma Brousseau
text: Absolutely disgusting. I ordered CBR mac n cheese (chicken bacon ranch) and I got chicken bacon and ranch on top of plain cold noodles....called and complained and this is apparently “how it comes” 👌🏼 Ok …More

name: Mike Roark
text: Love the food. The house pizzas as really unique and awesome.

name: D Howard
text: The wings weren't bad, but the pizza was AWFUL. No sauce and box was significantly bigger than the pizza given too me (why?). And their Topperstix taste like cardboard with barely any cheese. Will not be returning

name: Sushada Peebua
text: Walked into night, 2 hours before they close. The guy looks at me doesn’t say anything and walks away, leaves me up there waiting for like 5 mins before I just leave. Rang the bell and everything. Never coming back.

name: Kathy Kwong
text: Pizza and wings are great. Topperstix tastes awesome.

name: Ann Marie Bizeau
text: Placed an order, when I called back to add to my order I was hung up on 4 different times. I work walking distance from toppers, and it took over 45 minutes. Manager and staff on duty were very rude. Josh, and Alex you should get training. Wayne, you should check up on your employees.

name: Jim Laware
text: Loved the pizza. Had it for lunch today. So many options to choose from. Will be back to try the other options

name: Ryan Murray
text: Very disappointed, I work at the hospital down the street and we used to order atleast once a week from here, however as of late pizzas are either incorrectly made, or appear either old/overcooked or downright unappetizing. …More

name: Simon Edwards
text: Pretty good pizza and wings.  Staff were friendly and location was clean.

name: Vijaya Kottapalli
text: Toppers pizza has great recipes, and awesome customer service.

name: Jd Watson
text: Great pizza!!! Definitely try the topper stix they are amazing

name: William Lassiter
text: Terrible. Food was alright, but convenient because I work late. Twice in the last two weeks they have been closed before midnight despite listed being open to 3-4 am all week.

name: Susan Kinsey
text: Excellent food and excellent service

name: Brandon LaPiana
text: Papa John's, Domino's, Pizza Hut; it was nice knowing ya. There's a new pizzeria in town, and they've brought their A game.

name: Jade Jiles
text: Ordered two pizzas pepperoni and BBQ chicken. Both were not good. When they were delivered they were already cold/below room temperature. Was very dissatisfied.

name: Patricia Wilson
text: I order for the 1st time. Delivery.  Pizza was cold.  Toppings were burnt.  The overall taste was horrible.

name: Don Jerman
text: We had a pizza and it was great.

name: Mark Bryan
text: Loved the pizza. Will order again.

name: Bobbie Ural
text: Ordered a combination of buffalo chicken and tator tots pizza. WOW. It was fantastic!!. My favorite pizza place in town now.

name: Beatriz Montero
text: Very bad service, she has a very bad mood.

name: Rich Jones
text: Good food and love the hours. Open till 3 am everyday!!

name: Arielle P
text: I will never eat from here again. It took 2 hours for them to deliver a small order of cheesy bread. I tried to call them several times but the phone just rang until it hung up.

name: Mike Rogers
text: Wings with no sauce pizza no sauce and air pockets on the whole thing no ranch or cholipite ranch I know it's a discount because of the apartments but why bad quality
